# Cypress OAuth Testing Project

## Project Overview
Cypress end-to-end testing framework with OAuth authentication, data-driven testing, and Page Object Model pattern.

## Project Structure
- `/cypress/e2e` - Test specifications
- `/cypress/pages` - Page Object Model classes
- `/cypress/fixtures` - Test data files
- `/cypress/support` - Custom commands and utilities
- `/cypress/config` - Environment configurations

## Development Guidelines
- Follow POM pattern for all page interactions
- Store test data in fixtures as JSON
- Use custom commands for OAuth authentication
- Keep tests independent and reusable
